name: Superpower simulator (unofficial name)
description:
This game is an idea of what it might be like to live in a superpowered society. If you ever wondered what might be like to be a superhero, or maybe become the most infamouse villian or maybe even just become the most epic ordinary civilian.

Join the discord for future updates: https://discord.gg/Dc9ZZ9V

You can support this and future projects at our patreon: https://www.patreon.com/user?u=15264192&fan_landing=true
